*BrightBlade stopped for a moment and opened her leg compartment, not sure 
if Gangon was all right when she felt the ball bouncing around. She lifted 
the ball out and then began to continue towards the new Maximal base, 
holding the ball in her hands in front of her stomach. *

� That should be a bit better.�

* She then heard Perndabot, thinking about his question very carefully. He 
was too big to get inside the base undetected, maybe a lookout�or cover for 
her escape if something happened.
BrightBlade smiled at her last thought, back up would be perfect for him.
She then looked behind her just in time to see Perndabot duck and avoid 
another tree, noting that she was probably a fairly noticeable distraction.
BrightBlade chuckled as she then turned back to face ahead of her. *

� I�ll go in alone while you wait as back up outside for when I exit. I 
might have Maximals on my tail so I�ll need a..,� she looks back at him and 
looks at him from head to toe slowly, � strong and capable bot to slag them 
for me.�

* She then looked ahead again, turning her head back with a sly smile so 
that Perndabot would see it.
It was true, she needed a strong bot to get rid of the Maximals if they 
decide to be stupid and follow her. And Perndabot would come right in handy 
if it came to that.*
